name: Autoclave
description:
In the abandoned pleasure-planet Clavos, a lone lump of flesh squelches. 

Navigate by extending and retracting parts of your gelatinous body. Using QWEASD, push and retract your body through this city.  Roll where thou wilt.

This game is a work in progress and will be updated frequently until its formal completion date in late May. In the current iteration, the goal is just rolling and finding where the end of the game is. 

Adrian Miller - Lead Programmer, Artistic Director

AJ Tyagi - 3D Artist

Ethan Grossbach - Level Designer

Emanuel Malig - Writer, Producer

Sam Feng - Sound Designer, 3D Artist, UI Designer
